idea:
myGurukul is an online Music learning Platform, the app is a video learning platform where one can learn from Professional Artists using a mobile or Desktop and can also purchase professional Instrument. The App has Masterclasses on Bansuri, Violin, Tabla and Sitar and will be adding more instruments and art forms.
The app has renowned musician as gurus. It features Pandit Hariprasad Chaurasia approved 3 year diploma which helps learners get complete knowledge about Bansuri Playing from a Beginner to Advance Level.
In a short span of 18 months app has seen learners from 30+ countries.
name: VIVEK MUSIC SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Our Purpose is "Transforming Learning and Practice"

Our Mission: We are the Global Learning Platform for Outcome Based Learning in Healthcare 

Our Vision: is to become an integral part of the Healthcare Professional's daily routine by providing them essential and critical resource and scientific tools for improving practice, upskilling and to better patient outcomes

200,000+ Registered Healthcare professionals

7000+ Healthcare professional weekly engagement

1200+ Lectures conducted with reputed International and Indian faculty.

Collaborating with Leading Medical Associations, Institutions and University to conduct courses and Lectures.

DocMode is also associated with organizations in biotechnology, life-sciences and medical devices
name: DOCMODE HEALTH TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
